entry.title: Brutal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,862Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Amidst the forest bathed in the unparalleled light of the full moon, rain, blood, and mud intertwine with the fate of Stiles Stilinski, a young man on the brink of collapse between the genuine love of Derek Hale and the murderous violence of his ex, Theo Raeken. In the wake of pain, transformation, and buried secrets, Theo awakens to something he doesn't yet understand, but which consumes him from the inside out. Rage, instinct, memory, and fear drag him deeper into his obsession—which, in truth, had never left his mind. Meanwhile, Derek and Stiles try to resume a daily life that seems only possible through sarcasm, sharp jokes, and stolen kisses. But, unfortunately, Beacon Hills never forgets. And behind the tenderness lie wounds too deep, unconfessed sins, and a threat that breathes hungrily behind its shadows. This is an intense, overwhelming, and resilient novel. Where we talk about love in times of total darkness, about monsters that live inside and outside the skin, and about what remains of us when we are forced to survive, between brutality and kindness.

entry.title: Stiles Stilinski and the Relentless Need to Be All Knowing
entry.summary:
Author: ShieldOfIron

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 940Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 116

Summary: For some reason, Derek keeps touching him. And not like throwing against the wall, normal things. Derek was just touching him. Stiles doesn’t really know what to do about it so he just writes it down on the back of a Taco Bell receipt. 2:28 am 9/9 Deaton’s- Derek nudges me by my waist to move aside 4:51 pm 9/12 After Practice- he picked me and Scott up after school- opened door for me??? Definite upper butt this time. 9:21 pm 9/12- Harpies attacked, he pushed me behind him. After when I checked his arm, he put his hand on my cheek??? He eventually has to move to a second receipt which is when he tapes the first one into the back of a half used composition notebook. When that gets full, he buys a wall calendar and begins to note them down, looking for patterns. At first, he thinks it’s a power play over Scott, but incidents increase when Scott isn’t there. He starts testing it, moving closer. Getting nearby to see what Derek will do.

entry.title: Werewolf Ettiquette is a Pain in the Ass
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,123Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 610

Summary: An unexpected visitor brings news that a rival Alpha is interested in taking over Beacon Hills. This means that Derek has to travel to Colorado to convince Werewolf Society to deny that petition. Packs with a mated alpha look stronger and more stable, so Derek needs a mate. Or more accurately, he needs someone to pretend to be his mate. Enter Stiles, who is somehow Derek's best option. Etiquette lessons bring them closer together than either of them expected, and the part of Derek that is more wolf than human is starting to take an interest.

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,502Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 83

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: The Cabin
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,511Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: At the beginning of the California winter, Stiles decided it would be best to get away from the conflicts and turmoil he was experiencing in the city—being part of the Hale Pack, for a human, was no easy feat. He decided to spend a few days alone in the cabin given to him by his boyfriend—and Alpha—Derek Hale. The entire land and surrounding area belonged to him. The small, beautiful cabin practically already belonged to Stiles. Derek had given it to his boyfriend as a gift, but he, or rather, they, hadn't moved in yet. "The cabin is our safe haven," Derek would say. Stiles was taken there with Derek, who, after a long session of kisses and hugs, was left alone to unwind. But his new friend, loneliness, wouldn't keep him company for long: Derek would return, at 11 p.m., to his cabin, to the arms of his beloved True Mate. He couldn't, and even less could he imagine, facing the whole night away from Stiles. Derek was coming back to him—to his kisses.
